name: Half-Life: The Trap
storyline: Welcome to the Trap complex. Here, you will be subjected to numerous tests for dexterity and ingenuity. Please do not try to leave the elevator before it stops… The goal of your mission is to leave the trap and receive an award. Each section will consist of several chambers, in each chamber, you will find the portal capable to transfer you to the next chamber. At the end of each section, you will receive a subject, without which it is impossible to continue the test. Attention! Your safety is not guaranteed. No one will find you if you are injured or dying, except other testers. Good luck!
summary: The Trap is a mod featuring: The atmosphere of Valve's Portal game, many incredible puzzles, an achievement system, a long time to the end, and the trap is for your brain.

videos.title: Half-Life: The Trap - Walkthrough (100% Achievements & Alternate Ending)
